lines.text: Those weird tattoos on the dead wizard's face- they explain everything!
They're... ancient spirit-summoning tattoos that call up the ghosts of the dead!
He summoned the ghost of that robber there, and-
Normally I'd ask if you were just makin' things up, but... I don't have to ask, this time.
Come on! I can't have a little fun?
Hm... well, it's kind of hard to tell with the fuzzy quality, but it doesn't look like he's got Go Wizard tattoos.
Anyway, I don't think holograms can be wizards anyway, so... this is probably a dead end.
